price: Kisha akamtengeneza, na akampulizia roho yake, na akakujaalieni kusikia na kuona, na nyoyo za kufahamu. Ni uchache mnavyo shukuru.
arabic: ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰهُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: Kisha akamsimamisha na kumkuza, na akamtia ndani yake siri yake aliyo mkhusisha nayo, na akakupeni masikio, na macho, na akili, mpate kusikia na kuona na kufahamu. Nanyi hamshukuru ila kwa uchache.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma sawwāhu wanafakha fīhi min rūḥihi wajaʿala lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
